subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Yankees came back to tie the score at 2-2, 3-3 and 4-4, but in the ninth, they allowed Jose Bautista to steal second, and he soon scored the decisive run.
snippet: The Yankees came back to tie the score at 2-2, 3-3 and 4-4, but in the ninth, they allowed Jose Bautista to steal second, and he soon scored the decisive run.
